document.full_text: los angeles rapper m-bone, a member of the group cali swag district, was killed in what appeared to be a drive-by shooting, police and celebrity news sites said on monday.
document.title: la rapper m-bone killed in drive-by shooting
lines_and_colors: los angeles rapper m-bone, a member of the group cali swag district, was killed in what appeared to be a drive-by shooting, police and celebrity news sites said on monday.
